summary:
Back in June I documented a bug on macOS in how Spaces (or whatever they call they’re desktop management thingy now) works with websites added to the dock. 

I’m happy to report that after upgrading to Sequoia, the latest version of macOS, the bug has been fixed.  Excellent...

summary:
Adam Newbold, of omg. lol proprietor fame, is setting up a direct phone support line for his one-man company:

I remember the days when you could just punch in a number, hear a ring or two, and talk to a person who was qualified to answer your question or help you with your problem.  I think we all took that for granted, because it was the default experience...
title: ‘Call me, maybe’: Neatnik’s New Phone Support

summary:
